text:
đź‡¨đź‡ż Benny Cristo to represent Czech Republic in Eurovision 2021
As more broadcasters start looking into what their participation will look like in 2021, some broadcasters have confirmed early on that their 2020 artist will get the chance to compete in 2021. Today, Czech Republic joins the list as it’s confirmed that Benny Cristo will represent them in 2021.
Song Selection to be confirmed at a later date
As with the rules of the contest, a new song will be selected for Benny, and this will be confirmed at a later date.
Benny won this year’s National Round, but unfortunatelyÂ he didn’t get the opportunity to show up on the big Eurovision stage, so we decided to address him as a representative for next year. However, we would like to let fans and viewers speak into what song he would represent in the upcoming year, because ‘Kemama’ must not be according to the rules. We will keep the audience informed in time and continuously. Lucie KapounovĂˇ – Development Manager of Czech Television (Translated)
When this news was confirmed, Benny has expressed his excitement, towards the news that he will be representing Czech Republic.
I am very happy that Czech Television gave me a chance to show you what I have, even next year. I can promise all fans and viewers that I will use the time I have due to the world events, so you have something to look forward to. Benny Cristo on representing Czech Republic at the 2021 contest (Translated)
Benny joins the 13 other 2020 participants, who will be participating in the 2021 contest

Czech Republic in the Eurovision Song Contest
The Czech Republic debuted at the Eurovision Song Contest in 2007 with the song â€śMalĂˇ Dumaâ€ť by KĂˇlas, coming last in the semifinal with 1 point. Theyâ€™ve competed a total of 8 times in the contest, first qualifying for the final in 2016 with â€śI Standâ€ť by Gabriela GunÄŤĂ­kovĂˇ, finishing 25th.
In 2020, Benny Cristo was set to represent Czech Republic with the song ‘Kemama’. With his 2021 participation confirmed, a new song will be selected for Benny to participate with.
Are you happy that Benny Cristo will be representing Czech Republic in Eurovision next year?
